name: Swarovski Crystal Platforms Featuring
description:
These beautiful Steve Madden platforms feature over 10,300 authentic Aurora Borealis Swarovski crystals. The shoes showcase a different color effect depending on the light. These shoes are stunning!

I placed each crystal individually by hand. This strass (bling) project took me over 45 hours to complete. A true labor of love. You simply must see these in person. The is an 8-1/2.

Hurry! Sale Ends January 15th, 0214.

If you happen to be in the Milwaukee, WI, you are welcome to make an appointment to stop by my boutique for a showing. I am located in the Bay View area.

Interested in me strassing (blinging) your favorite shoes? Please visit my website for more details or a free online quote.

Bling! Bling!
http://www.sparklecreationsbytyyon.com

name: Steve Madden Platforms Featuring Authentic Swarovski Crystals
description:
These Steve Madden platforms feature authentic black (jet) Swarovski crystals. This is the real deal ladies. Each crystal was individually placed by hand. You simply must see these beauties in person to really appreciate them. They bling something fierce! You will not be disappointed. 

If you have a pair of shoes you'd like me to strass (bling) please feel free to contact me. I'd love to create something special just for you.
